name: Advance to Illinois Ave
description: Advance to Illinois Ave—If you pass Go, collect $200

name: Advance to St. Charles Place
description: Advance to St. Charles Place – If you pass Go, collect $200

name: Advance to Utility
description: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times the amount thrown.

name: Advance to Railroad
description: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she {he} is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

name: Go to Jail
description: Go to Jail–Go directly to Jail–Do not pass Go, do not collect $200

name: Repairs
description: Make general repairs on all your property–For each house pay $25–For each hotel $100

name: Go to Reading
description: Take a trip to Reading Railroad–If you pass Go, collect $200

name: Go to Boardwalk
description: Take a walk on the Boardwalk–Advance token to Boardwalk

name: Chairman
description: You have been elected Chairman of the Board–Pay each player $50

name: Crossword
description: You have won a crossword competition—Collect $100
